1.label: Set to Default
1.description: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings).

3.label: HW Pullup
3.description: For some Smart meters you will need an external pullup resistor to receive the data, one of it is the Kaifa meter. 0x00: disabled. 0x01-0xFF: enabled (default 0x00)

5.label: Data validation
5.description: Settings for data validation LED. Bit 7-4: Data received timeout (x 10). Bit 3-0: Framecount when data is valid (default 0x33 (0x30|0x03))

72.label: Channel 1 auto Meter report usage W
72.description: Conditions current usage will be automatically reported. Param 1-3: Difference in absolute value. Param 4: Difference in percentage between previous and current value. (default 0x0000050A (5Watt and 10%))

73.label: Channel 1 auto Meter report usage kWh
73.description: Conditions current usage will be automatically reported. Param 1-3: Difference in absolute value. Param 4: Difference in percentage between previous and current value. (default 0x00006400 (0.1kWh and 0%))

74.label: Channel 1 auto Meter report delivered W
74.description: Conditions current delivered will be automatically reported. Param 1-3: Difference in absolute value. Param 4: Difference in percentage between previous and current value. (default 0x0000050A (5Watt and 10%))

75.label: Channel 1 auto Meter report delivered kWh
75.description: Conditions current delivered will be automatically reported. Param 1-3: Difference in absolute value. Param 4: Difference in percentage between previous and current value. (default 0x00006400 (0.1kWh and 0%))

76.label: Channel 2 auto Meter report usage W
76.description: Conditions current usage will be automatically reported. Param 1-3: Difference in absolute value. Param 4: Difference in percentage between previous and current value. (default 0x0000050A (5Watt and 10%))

77.label: Channel 2 auto Meter report usage kWh
77.description: Conditions current usage will be automatically reported. Param 1-3: Difference in absolute value. Param 4: Difference in percentage between previous and current value. (default 0x00006400 (0.1kWh and 0%))

78.label: Channel 2 auto Meter report delivered W
78.description: Conditions current delivered will be automatically reported. Param 1-3: Difference in absolute value. Param 4: Difference in percentage between previous and current value. (default 0x0000050A (5Watt and 10%))

79.label: Channel 2 auto Meter report delivered kWh
79.description: Conditions current delivered will be automatically reported. Param 1-3: Difference in absolute value. Param 4: Difference in percentage between previous and current value. (default 0x00006400 (0.1kWh and 0%))

81.label: Channel 3 auto Meter report usage m3
81.description: Conditions total used will be automatically reported. Param 1-3: Difference in absolute value. Param 4: Difference in percentage between previous and current value. (default 0x00006400 (0.1m3 and 0%))
